saveRequest(User) - Method in class simplesocial.server.User
Saves a friend request from the given user.
search(String) - Method in class simplesocial.client.Client
Searches for Users which username contains string.
search(String) - Method in class simplesocial.server.UsersDB
Searches for User whose usernames contain the string str.

Sends a Post to the follower.

Server - Class in simplesocial.server
This class represent the SimpleSocial server.
SERVER_ADDR - Variable in class simplesocial.client.Client
The IP address of the server.
setAlive(String) - Method in class simplesocial.server.OnlineUsers
Sets the User with the given username alive (has responded to the last Keep-Alive signal).

simplesocial - package simplesocial
 
simplesocial.client - package simplesocial.client
 
simplesocial.server - package simplesocial.server
 
storeConfiguration() - Method in class simplesocial.client.Client
Stores the configuration in a JSON file named "conf.json" located in the directory Client.DATA_DIR_PATH.
storeConfiguration() - Static method in class simplesocial.server.Server
Stores the configuration in a JSON file named "conf.json" located in the directory Server.DATA_DIR_PATH.
storePosts(BlockingQueue<Post>, String) - Static method in class simplesocial.client.Client
Stores the queue of posts posts in a file located in the directory Client.DATA_DIR_PATH, with the name "posts-<username>.db".
storeRequests(CopyOnWriteArrayList<String>, String) - Static method in class simplesocial.client.Client
Stores the list of friend requests requests in a file located in the directory Client.DATA_DIR_PATH, with the name "requests-<username>.db".
storeUsersDB(UsersDB) - Static method in class simplesocial.server.Server
Stores the user database in a file named "users.db" located in the directory Server.DATA_DIR_PATH.
